content.text: 同步递归删除目录及其所有内容。Synchronously removes a directory and all its contents recursively with comprehensive error handling.
如果删除成功返回true，如果发生错误返回false。True if deletion succeeded, false if an error occurred
For Node.js 14+, consider using fs.rmSync with recursive option

summary.text: 要完全删除的目录路径。The directory path to remove completely

text.comment: 要完全删除的目录路径。The directory path to remove completely

Function:

rmdirsSync

Description:

同步递归删除目录及其所有内容。Synchronously removes a directory and all its contents recursively with comprehensive error handling.

Returns:

如果删除成功返回true，如果发生错误返回false。True if deletion succeeded, false if an error occurred

Example:
// Remove a temporary directory
const removed = rmdirsSync('./temp-build');
if (removed) {
  console.log('Temporary files cleaned up');
} else {
  console.log('Failed to clean up temporary files');
}
Example:
// Safe cleanup with existence check
if (fsExistsSync('./old-cache')) {
  rmdirsSync('./old-cache');
}
Deprecated:

For Node.js 14+, consider using fs.rmSync with recursive option

See:

https://nodejs.org/api/fs.html#fs_fs_rmsync_path_options - Node.js fs.rmSync documentation
